title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 July2013 IE11 NET451 VC++ DX
description:
Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 En-US integrated updates until July 2013, IE11 Developer Preview, .NET Framework 4.5.1 Preview, DirectX redist June 2010, Visual C++ redist x86 x64, and Pre-activated using Windows Loader 2.2.1.

As we know, yesterday IE11 released for Windows 7 (IE11 Developer Preview), so that i interested to integrate IE11 DP into win 7 iso.

I have integrated IE11 DP and updates into this OS using dism and this OS contain runtime softwares that i added using setupcomplete.cmd for make easier than Audit-Mode as i did before. 

iso Name: 7USP164July2013_IE11.iso
MD5: f01a2484d9b26eeab31a977a4fc80f84
SHA-1: 9e8e081649d7c392891a74c83336eb607146fb50
CRC-32: 7ce71e4c

Runtime softwares added inside Scripts folder: 
Slim .NET Framework 4.5.1 Preview by ricktendo at wincert forum
DirectX Redist June 2010
Visual C++ Redist 2005 SP1 MFC Security Update x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2008 SP1 MFC Security Update x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2010 SP1 MFC Security Update x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2012 Update 3 x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2013 Preview x86 x64
(these runtime is for playing game, and also for Visio app)

3rd party drivers added using dism after add-package:
AMD HDC
AMD Mass Storage
AMD USB Filter SB8
Asmedia USB3 Driver
Realtek LAN Driver
Realtek HD Audio Driver HDXCR driver for PC
SMBus AMD

Source for this OS from:
X17-59465.iso ; Windows 7 Ultimate SP1U x64 English by Digital River

Tools that i use:
dism for integrate updates and drivers into wim
imageX for export image with command /export compress maximum
oscdimg for making iso
Win Toolkit 1.4.1.27 for convert msu to cab for faster process injecting of updates

No tweak, No autounattended in here, except integrating updates and drivers and adding runtime softwares, and then pre-activated.

And, this is my steps during process integrating:

1) integrate Windows Update Agent 3.0 offline installer:
WUClient-SelfUpdate-ActiveX.cab
WUClient-SelfUpdate-Aux-TopLevel.cab
WUClient-SelfUpdate-Core-TopLevel.cab

2) integrate IE11 DP Pre-requisites:
KB2533623
KB2639308
KB2670838
KB2729094-v2
KB2731771
KB2786081
KB2834140 (fix for KB2670838)
KB2836502 (fix for KB2670838)

3) integrate IE11 DP exe installer that i extracted became cab:
IE-Win7.cab

4) integrate IE-11 DP Add-On:
IE-Hyphenation-en
IE-Spelling-en

5) integrate Important Update and Optional Update:
KB971033, KB982018-v3, KB2479943, KB2491683, KB2506014, KB2506212, KB2506928-v2, KB2509553, KB2511455, KB2515325, KB2529073, KB2532531, KB2536275, KB2536276-v2, KB2541014, KB2544893, KB2545698, KB2547666, KB2552343, KB2560656, KB2563227, KB2564958, KB2570947, KB2574819, KB2579686, KB2584146, KB2585542, KB2592687, KB2604115, KB2618451, KB2619339, KB2620704, KB2621440, KB2631813, KB2640148-v2, KB2644615, KB2645640, KB2647753-v4, KB2653956, KB2654428, KB2655992, KB2656356, KB2660075, KB2667402-v2, KB2676562, KB2685811, KB2685813, KB2685939, KB2690533, KB2691442, KB2698365, KB2699779-v2, KB2705219-v2, KB2709630, KB2709981-v2, KB2712808, KB2718704, KB2719857, KB2726535, KB2727528, KB2729452, KB2732059-v5, KB2732487-v2, KB2732500-v2, KB2736422, KB2742599, KB2743555, KB2749655, KB2750841, KB2753842-v2, KB2756921, KB2757638, KB2761217, KB2763523, KB2770660, KB2773072, KB2779562, KB2785220, KB2786400, KB278964, KB2790113, KB2791765, KB2798162, KB2799926, KB2804579, KB2807986, KB2808679, KB2813170, KB2813347, KB2813430, KB2813956, KB2820197, KB2820331, KB2830290, KB2832414, KB2833946, KB2834886, KB2835361, KB2835364, KB2836942, KB2836943, KB2839894, KB2840631, KB2844286, KB2845187, KB2845690, KB2847927, KB2850851

- Note:
2 updates that will be installed at the end setup windows:
KB2603229 and KB2533552, because these update can not be installed by offline install. 
2 updates that i did not integrate: KB2803821 and KB2840149. These update can issue crash, as we know:)
Other update that not added:
Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool and Definition Update for Windows Defender.

6) integrate drivers
7) copy runtime softwares, Windows Loader, and setupcomplete.cmd into Scripts folder to Setup folder and unmount image with commit for finish integrating
8) export image with imagex for make fresh wim
9) making iso with oscdimg without compress for faster process

Seed and enjoy....
